Package org.activebpel.work

The work manager and friends, which provide a facility for scheduling asynchronous operations.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeProcessWorkManager Defines the interface for a work manager that limits the amount of work scheduled per process.
IAeStoppableWorkManager Defines interface for work managers that can be stopped automatically when the engine shuts down.
IAeWorkDoneListener Listener interface to receive notification of when a WorkItem completes.
 

Class Summary
AeAbstractWork Base class to help create a Work instance.
AeDelegatingWork Implements a Work object that delegates to another Work object.
AeDelegatingWorkManager Implements a WorkManager that delegates to another WorkManager.
AeExceptionReportingWork Extends AeDelegatingWork to report any exceptions thrown when the Work runs.
AeExceptionReportingWorkManager Extends AeDelegatingWorkManager to wrap scheduled work in instances of AeExceptionReportingWork.
AeProcessWorkManager Limits the amount of work scheduled per process.
AeProcessWorkQueue Holds the queue of Work objects waiting to be scheduled for a process and the count of Work objects currently scheduled.
AeQueuedWork Holds work that is waiting for a thread to execute it.
AeRemoteWorkItem Remote work items are returned to the caller when the work that was scheduled implements Serializable.
AeThreadPool Simple thread pool
AeWorkerThread A pooled worker thread that executes a Work object.
AeWorkEvent Event that gets fired to a WorkListener to report progress on a Work object.
AeWorkItem Reports the status of work that has been scheduled with the work manager.
AeWorkManager Implementation of the WorkManager for Application Servers spec from IBM/BEA.
 

Package org.activebpel.work Description

The work manager and friends, which provide a facility for scheduling asynchronous operations.
